images.name: Simone Fontecchio beats first-quarter buzzer with a slam
images.caption: Tobias Harris' layup attempt is off the mark, but Simone Fontecchio swoops in for a putback slam to end the quarter.

articles.description: Tobias Harris' layup attempt is off the mark, but Simone Fontecchio swoops in for a putback slam to end the quarter.
articles.headline: Simone Fontecchio beats first-quarter buzzer with a slam

articles.description: Junior Bridgeman, a former NBA sixth man who became a billionaire philanthropist and Bucks minority owner, died at the age of 71.
articles.headline: Ex-NBA player, billionaire entrepreneur Junior Bridgeman dies

articles.description: Thunder star forward Jalen Williams is out for Wednesday's clash vs. the Celtics due to a hip strain.
articles.headline: Thunder star Jalen Williams (hip) ruled out vs. Celtics

images.name: Jonathan Kuminga exits game with ankle sprain
images.caption: Late in the second quarter, Jonathan Kuminga sprains his ankle while playing defense and leaves the game.

articles.description: Warriors forward Jonathan Kuminga plans to return and play on Thursday against Sacramento for the first time since injuring his right ankle on Jan. 4, sources told ESPN.
articles.headline: Warriors' Jonathan Kuminga (ankle) plans to return Thursday, sources say

images.name: Jonathan Kuminga
images.caption: Using an IR spot on someone who can help in the weeks ahead, like Jonathan Kuminga, can pay off big.

images.name: Zion Williamson [1296x729]
images.alt: New Orleans Pelicans forward Zion Williamson (1) dribbles the ball as Houston Rockets forward Dillon Brooks (9) defends during the game at Toyota Center.
images.caption: Given his history and the team's poor record, Zion Williamson is a candidate to be shut down in the final weeks.

articles.description: Making it to the playoffs is nice, but you want to win, right? Here are tips to prepare your roster in advance of the fantasy playoffs, and managing to win once you're there.
articles.headline: Ultimate guide to the fantasy basketball playoffs: Tips to help you win it all
